name: 80s Japanese Idol Hairstyle ( Seiko Matsuda )
description:
Buy me a coffee if you enjoy using my model :) thx u very much

80s Japanese Idol Hairstyle ( Seiko Matsuda )

Trigger Word : seikomatsuda

Weight : 0.5-0.8

Make sure to set Denoising Strength around 0.3-0.4 or the face will melt...

Tested with some Realistic + Anime model and it's looking good.

Not test with full body or other pose yet, you can try it yourself haha.

Now 40++ dude can have some 80s hairstyle for their gal :)
